title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checkboxes in the table are not using a busy cursor while updating the checked state. It is unclear whether the update process is running or not.
EB: The checkboxes in the table should use a busy cursor while updating the checked state. This will provide visual feedback to the user that the update process is running.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the Export Zip feature.
3. Check one or more checkboxes in the table.
4. Observe that the checkboxes do not display a busy cursor while updating.
5. Verify that it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to update the checked state.
6. Confirm that a busy cursor is not shown during this process.
